nodes.text: Mother Ithor was an Ithorian Herdship named for the Ithorian homeworld, Ithor.
Mother Ithor was similar to almost every other Ithorian Herdship, being a huge flattened ball which was designed to simulate the jungles of Ithor, the Ithorian homeworld, in a space-worthy vessel.

Mother Ithor traded with planets on the border of Hutt Space, the Tion Cluster, and the Corporate Sector. It would often venture into these regions in order to provide relief to the oppressed people within.
